file.name: mimecast.yaml
file.content:
components:
  schemas:
    tmp0:
      properties:
        domain: {type: string}
        emailAddress: {type: string}
        folderId: {type: string}
        id: {type: string}
        internal: {type: string}
        message: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp1:
      properties:
        action: {type: string}
        comment: {type: string}
        disableLogClick: {type: string}
        disableRewrite: {type: string}
        disableUserAwareness: {type: string}
        domain: {type: string}
        id: {type: string}
        matchType: {type: string}
        scheme: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp2:
      properties:
        parsed_domains: {type: string}
        parsed_urls: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp3:
      properties:
        base64: {type: string}
        id: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp4:
      properties:
        domain: {type: string}
        emailAddress: {type: string}
        internal: {type: string}
        name: {type: string}
        type: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp5:
      properties:
        description: {type: string}
        folderCount: {type: string}
        id: {type: string}
        parentId: {type: string}
        source: {type: string}
        userCount: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp6:
      properties:
        attachmentCount: {type: string}
        ccm: {type: string}
        expired: {type: string}
        from_displayableName: {type: string}
        from_emailAddress: {type: string}
        id: {type: string}
        read: {type: string}
        recalled: {type: string}
        received: {type: string}
        size: {type: string}
        smash: {type: string}
        status: {type: string}
        subject: {type: string}
        to_displayableName: {type: string}
        to_emailAddress: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp7:
      properties:
        base64: {type: string}
        id: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp8:
      properties:
        id: {type: string}
        sender: {type: string}
        to: {type: string}
        type: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp9:
      properties:
        attachmentcount: {type: string}
        displayfrom: {type: string}
        displayto: {type: string}
        id: {type: string}
        receiveddate: {type: string}
        size: {type: string}
        smash: {type: string}
        status: {type: string}
        subject: {type: string}
      type: object
  securitySchemes:
    BasicAuth: {scheme: basic, type: http}
info:
  contact: {email: frikky@shuffler.io, name: '@frikkylikeme', url: 'https://twitter.com/frikkylikeme'}
  description: Automated generation of Mimecast Mimecast
  title: Mimecast Mimecast
  version: 1.0.0
  x-logo: data:image/png;base64,
openapi: 3.0.2
paths:
  tmp0:
    post:
      description: Adds or removes group members
      parameters:
      - description: List of domains/email addresses
        example: test.user@swimlane.com
        in: query
        name: Members
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: The Mimecast ID for which group to add/remove the members.
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Group ID
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: If False, removes the members from the group
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Add Member to Group
        required: true
        schema: {type: boolean}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp0'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Mimecast Add or Remove Group Members
  tmp1:
    post:
      description: Add a URL to the Targeted Threat Protection
      parameters:
      - description: Set to 'block' to blacklist the URL, 'permit' to whitelist it.
        example: block
        in: query
        name: Action
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: The URL to block or permit.
        example: https://example.com
        in: query
        name: URL
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Set to 'explicit' to block or permit only instances of the full
          URL. Set to 'domain' to block or permit any URL with the same domain.
        example: explicit
        in: query
        name: Match Type
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Disable rewriting of this URL in emails. Only applies if action
          is 'permit'.
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Disable Rewrite
        required: false
        schema: {type: boolean}
      - description: Disable User Awareness challenges for this URL. Only applies
          if action is 'permit'.
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Disable User Awareness
        required: false
        schema: {type: boolean}
      - description: Disable logging if user clicks on the URL.
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Disable Log Click
        required: false
        schema: {type: boolean}
      - description: A comment about the why the URL is managed for tracking purposes.
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Comment
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp1'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Mimecast Create Managed URL
  tmp2:
    post:
      description: Mimecast Decode Protect URLs
      parameters:
      - description: The URLs that need to be decoded
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: URLs to Decode
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp2'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Mimecast Decode URL
  tmp3:
    post:
      description: Returns a file attachment from an archived message.
      parameters:
      - description: The Mimecast ID of the message attachment to return.
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: ID
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp3'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Mimecast Get File
  tmp4:
    post:
      description: Returns the members for a group
      parameters:
      - description: Mimecast Group ID
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: ID
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp4'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Mimecast Get Group Members
  tmp5:
    post:
      description: Return all groups matching query
      parameters:
      - description: A string to query the groups; Ex. The group description.
        example: Blocked Senders
        in: query
        name: Query String
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Source to query. Can be either idap or cloud.
        example: cloud
        in: query
        name: Group Source
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp5'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Mimecast Get Groups
  tmp6:
    post:
      description: Returns a list of messages for a given user.
      parameters:
      - description: 'The message list type, must be one of: INBOX or SENT, default
          is INBOX.'
        example: INBOX
        in: query
        name: View
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: The email address to return the message list for. If excluded,
          then messages for the logged in user are returned.
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Mailbox
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: The start date of messages to return. Default is the last calendar
          month.
        example: 2015-11-16T14:49:18+0000
        in: query
        name: Start
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: The end date of messages to return. Default is the end of the
          current day.
        example: 2015-12-25T11:45:23+0000
        in: query
        name: End
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Include messages for addresses that the mailbox has delegate
          permissions to. Default false.
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Include Delegates
        required: false
        schema: {type: boolean}
      - description: Include messages for alias addresses of the mailbox. Default
          true.
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Include Aliases
        required: false
        schema: {type: boolean}
      - description: Limit the number of messages returned, defaults to all
        example: ''
        in: body
        name: Message Limit
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp6'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Mimecast Get Message List
  tmp7:
    post:
      description: Mimecast Get Message Part
      parameters:
      - description: The Mimecast ID of the message attachment to return.
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: ID
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: The email address to return the message for.
        example: test.user@swimlane.com
        in: query
        name: Mailbox
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Defines which copy of the message part to return, must be DELIVERED
          or RECEIVED. Defaults to RECEIVED
        example: RECEIVED
        in: query
        name: Context
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: The message part to return, must be one of HTML, PLAIN, RFC822,
          or TRANSMISSION_MESSAGE_BODY. Defaults to HTML.
        example: HTML
        in: query
        name: Type
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp7'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Mimecast Get Message Part
  tmp8:
    post:
      description: Mimecast Permit Or Block Sender
      parameters:
      - description: The email address of sender to permit or block.
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Sender
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: The email address of recipient to permit or block.
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: To
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Choose to either 'permit' (to bypass spam checks) or 'block'
          (to reject the email).
        example: permit
        in: query
        name: Action
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp8'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Mimecast Permit Or Block Sender
  tmp9:
    post:
      description: Mimecast Search
      parameters:
      - description: The query param for the search. Leave blank to return all
        example: Subject
        in: query
        name: Query Key
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: The query Value for the search. Leave blank to return all
        example: subject string
        in: query
        name: Query Value
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: The XML query string. This overrides query key/value
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Query XML String
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Defines if the search is an administrative search or an end user
          user search.
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Admin
        required: true
        schema: {type: boolean}
      - description: Limit the number of records returned, defaults to all.
        example: ''
        in: body
        name: Limit
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: The email address to search, defaults to all.
        example: test.user@swimlane.com
        in: query
        name: Mailbox
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp9'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Mimecast Search
tags:
- {name: Network Security & Management}

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: tmp6: post: operation "": parameters: parse parameter "Message Limit": unsupported parameter type "body"
